snippet.title: Bases Loaded 4 (Jaleco, 1993) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
The ultimate baseball experience comes to the Nintendo Entertainment System with BASES LOADED 4. Take control of every aspect of the game. When you hit the field, there are larger players, and you can field the ball from an outfielders point of view. Manage you team to improve speed, stamina, and your chances of winning. When you start a game, you can try to make it through a 130 game season with a best of seven championship series. Invite a friend over, and play BASES LOADED 4.

Known on Famicom as: Moe-Pro! Saikyou Hen

NES Relatives:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ygofWR2A3ZA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FaUk0DCgBI4
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sfumppUWRVk


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
